text: Mbe mba nzambarer mani ga muuŋgim, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar guigira Pita phorga kav ana rugim, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde kha Isreriŋ gumgir ruu gum mben gumgir pani, nde ntigem, ŋka kha suani mbatɨgi guma ŋka ana kurigim, nde ne nzuav ŋkan nzaire? Ee, nde khueŋ kaŋgi zav nzai ti, kha guma ana ram muuŋgiap nzerigi.
